title: Menstruation Kalkylator
description: Predict your next period and ovulation dates
metaDescription: Gratis period calculator - Predict your next period, ovulation dates, and fertile window. Track your menstrual cycle easily.

form.title: Ange Din Information
form.lastPeriodHelp: Datum when your last menstruation started
form.cycleLengthHelp: Average number of days between periods (typically 28 days)
form.periodLengthHelp: Number of days your period lasts (typically 5 days)

info.title: Om the Menstruation Kalkylator
info.description: This calculator predicts your upcoming menstrual periods and ovulation dates baserat på your last period and average cycle length. Ägglossning typically occurs 14 days before the next period.
info.formula: Formel: Next period = Last period + Cycle length. Ägglossning = Next period - 14 days
info.limitations: Note: This calculator provides estimates baserat på regular cycles. Menstrual cycles can vary naturally. For medical concerns or cycle irregularities, please consult with a healthcare professional.
